playerManipulation

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • playerManipulation.Player

  • public class Player
extends Object
    This class creates and handles all information related to the player object. A player's information is stored here during the duration of him/her logged in. The class also handles getting this information as well as clearing it for log out. Player information includes: username, password, security answer, security question, maximum level achieved and a players high scores.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Player(String username)
      This Constructor is used to create a Player object when a player logs in, in order to manipulate or obtain their information prior to writing to the database

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the the current player's highest 10 scores

      Gets the maximum level achieved by the player

      Gets the current player's Security Answer
      static String getSecurityQuestion()
      Gets the current player's Security Question
      static String getUsername()
      Gets the current player's username
      void setNewHighScore(int newScore)
      Given a player's new score it attempts to add it to his/her top 10 high scores.

      • clearPlayer

        public static boolean clearPlayer()
        Sets player object to empty strings in order to log the Player out.
        Returns:
        returns true if clears player data correctly, false otherwise

      • getHighScores

        public static int[] getHighScores()
        Gets the the current player's highest 10 scores
        Returns:
        an array with the players highest 10 scores

      • setNewHighScore

        public void setNewHighScore(int newScore)
        Given a player's new score it attempts to add it to his/her top 10 high scores. It will only be added if it is at least higher that the player's current 10th highest score
        Parameters:
        newScore - the score that was obtained by the player
